reviews.review: Gioco abbastanza carino, tutto sommato lo consiglio.

The learning curve is pretty sharp but once you learn some of the basics and skills you will keep coming back to play both sides killer and survivor. Get it when you can new stuff coming out all the time.
I think it's a great game actually. It's way more fun with loud sounds tho. It is a really challenging game but cool and scary at the same time.
Un juego con bastante potencial pero los desarrolladores se lo deben currar mas o nadie jugara esta maravilla de juego <3

pretty good game, made some nice improvements

Still missing some bugfixes and balance changes tho

Top. Doentio. Viciante. E todo bugado. Recomendo

Dead by daylight has been on a downward spiral since the release of Blight. Every DLC drop has had a massive issue that caused gameplay problems. Twins? buggy mess that would get you stuck unable to move or switch. Trickster? underpowered killer quickly rose because two addons completely broke him. Nemesis? buggy zombies that still get stuck on nothing and cant forget that RPD was disabled for weeks and had major performance issues on console. Pinhead? Was supposed to have the voicelines on launch but didnt and had the NFT scam. Artist? Unfun ranged killer that makes looping boring. Onryo? C tier killer with a completely forgettable survivor. Dredge? Better version of freddy. and Freddy is good.

Cant forget the fact your rank doesnt matter anymore. Another company thinking SBMM improves the quality of matches. No point in getting to rank 1 if it doesnt mean anything.

DBD peaked in 2017, early 2018. Back when wannabe comp players on ultra stretched resolutions trying their hardest didnt exist.  Take me back bro, this shit is not what it used to be

Lo recomiendo totalmente, este bug es muy divertido y tambiÃ©n trae un poco de juego! es uno de mis vicio con mis amigos aunque lo dlc como freedy lo hace mas dificil pero Ã±eeee

While admittedly buggy, this is still a fantastic game that's most definitely worth the asking price. It's never once felt boring or repetative, despite literally doing the exact same thing every game if you main one or the other from survivor or killer. Even just the base-game killers alone are very diverse and offer very different ways to play, with the DLC providing even more variation and unique ways to play.

t's not about scores or rank,it's about what kind of person u choose to be. Brave or weak,pround or guilty.
